data.text: @Aw_what @turts__ And she also looks like Sloth from the Goonies in a wig. Just sayin 🤷🏻‍♂️
@Jill4life3 And who also worked with Genomics England but has shown a disgraceful lack of understanding when it comes to testing.
@Aw_what The pathologist with no work. In a pandemic 🙄
@scb909 @jneill Bank account? Have you looked into this or making a very interesting suggestion?

@Aw_what @jneill Her name didn't fall onto the paper with Yeadon   "review of the RTPCR test to detect SARS-CoV-2 reveals 10 major scientific flaws at the molecular and methodological level: consequences for false positive results" the bank account links the authors is the one to investigate
@jneill Of course. Which makes me question: is Craig just an idiot or purely rotten right to the core? I suppose it could be both, right enough.
@CarrDutton Many people have complained to the regulatory body but doesn't appear to have any effect. There seriously needs to come a time that the police speak to these charlatans.
@Aw_what And her dangerous lies have and are costing peoples lives. Is she still on her professional register?
